title: System Design Level 5 â€” CAP & Consistency
concept: MCQs on CAP theorem and consistency trade-offs.

challenges.title: Q1: CAP Trade-off
challenges.description: According to CAP theorem, in presence of a network partition, a system must choose between:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) Consistency and Availability
b) Consistency and Partition tolerance
c) Availability and Partition tolerance
d) Scalability and Latency

challenges.title: Q2: Eventual Consistency
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) All replicas always have exactly the same data at any moment
b) Reads may see stale data for a while, but will become consistent if no new updates happen
c) System never guarantees consistency
d) Only the leader node has correct data
